ygData.subject: Re: I have the answers.
ygData.msgSnippet: I just double checked and she does sell scalers.  They are the very last mold on the left of her list.  I m  on Cazic-Thule but I would assume that they are
ygData.messageBody:
I just double checked and she does sell scalers. They are the very last
mold on the left of her list. I
'm on Cazic-Thule but I would assume that they are all the same. As far as
spending hundreds of Platinum. Yes, expect to spend hundreds before you
make any banded regularly. I'd spend at least 200PP before I could make it
regularly. I only have an INT of 75 so that slowed me down, but I have a
very high success rate so it counterbalances. At 50 I was making skewers 30
or 40% of the time. Don't worry. After you are good at banded that first
couple of hundred you put into it won't seem like any big deal. That just a
few hours good work now.

Arden
Cazic-Thule
